text: Jubilee Post in Nugegoda is a marker placed to commemorate the Golden Jubilee of Queen Victoria. Located at the intersection of Old Kottawa, Kotte (B120) and Ekwatta Roads, it is a local landmark. It has since been neglected by the Sri Jayawardenapura Kotte Municipal Council which has painted it white. ==References== Category:Landmarks in Sri Jayawardenepura Kotte Category:1887 in Ceylon
title: Jubilee Post, Nugegoda
